title: 'Very good quality'
body: I'm honestly surprised at the quality of this mousepad - extremely good quality and it looks it will serve me for quite a long time. The finish is good, the stiches look strong and overall looks like a great pad for my daily work. Deserves 5 star rating. If you are on the fence for this one, just go ahead and purchase it. One of the best 250 bucks I've spent on Amazon.

title: 'Not a great mouse pad as it slips around on table.'
body: The media could not be loaded. The pad is good quality but dosnt adher to the table. Hence whenever you move the mouse it moves with it, defeating the whole purpose of mouse pad.
